summary: DOD runs schools for children of active duty servicemembers and others who support DOD's mission at military installations around the globe. In this Q&A, we reviewed operations of two DOD schools in the Kingdom of Bahrain, which is in the Middle East. As of school year 2024-25: Nearly 600 pre-K through grade 12 students attended the schools DOD was working to improve school facilities (e.g...
title: K-12 Education: Administration of DOD Schools in Bahrain
